            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>Determining the changes in winter stream flow on the North Slave Taiga Shield; the drivers of these recent changes; the impacts of these changes on the environment; and the implications to water quality.  This project focuses on a region which contains the greatest concentration of people and infrastructure in the NWT and has pressing water management and contaminant related concerns. It is imperative that resource managers have knowledge of the current state and trends of water quality and quantity in this region to properly predict cumulative impacts of anthropogenic activities and to effectively plan and manage northern development. An NWT CIMP funded project.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

name: 10-25976-1ed9-gr10
notes: Determining the changes in winter stream flow on the North Slave Taiga Shield; the drivers of these recent changes; the impacts of these changes on the environment; and the implications to water quality.  This project focuses on a region which contains the greatest concentration of people and infrastructure in the NWT and has pressing water management and contaminant related concerns. It is imperative that resource managers have knowledge of the current state and trends of water quality and quantity in this region to properly predict cumulative impacts of anthropogenic activities and to effectively plan and manage northern development. An NWT CIMP funded project.

notes_translated.en: Determining the changes in winter stream flow on the North Slave Taiga Shield; the drivers of these recent changes; the impacts of these changes on the environment; and the implications to water quality.  This project focuses on a region which contains the greatest concentration of people and infrastructure in the NWT and has pressing water management and contaminant related concerns. It is imperative that resource managers have knowledge of the current state and trends of water quality and quantity in this region to properly predict cumulative impacts of anthropogenic activities and to effectively plan and manage northern development. An NWT CIMP funded project.
notes_translated.fr: Déterminer les changements du débit hivernal des cours d'eau dans le bouclier de la taïga du Slave Nord ; les moteurs de ces récents changements ; les impacts de ces changements sur l'environnement ; et les implications pour la qualité de l'eau. Ce projet se concentre sur une région qui abrite la plus forte concentration de personnes et d'infrastructures des Territoires du Nord-Ouest et qui connaît des préoccupations pressantes en matière de gestion de l'eau et de contaminants. Il est impératif que les gestionnaires des ressources connaissent l'état actuel et les tendances de la qualité et de la quantité de l'eau dans cette région pour prévoir correctement les impacts cumulatifs des activités anthropiques et pour planifier et gérer efficacement le développement du Nord. Un projet financé par le CIMP des Territoires du Nord-Ouest.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: CIMP 140: Changing hydrology in the Taiga Shield_ Geochemical and resource management implications

title_translated.fr: CIMP 140 : Évolution de l'hydrologie dans le bouclier de la taïga_ Implications géochimiques et de gestion des ressources
